name: Kill the Kari
description:
Multiplayer game for 3 to 5 people

Note: For an error the zip file  contains two .exe, one is an older version, you need to launch the one named  KillTheKari.exe and ignore the other one.

Controls 

W,A,S,D for movement. Click to kill and E to pick up candles if you are a kari kari

Theme: 

Local Urban Legends

Diversifiers: 

1. variations under a team: the game must reutilize an element, as a scenario, mechanic or character, through the entire game.

2. Adaptation: the game must adapt an existing plot, in Creative Commons or public domain

Team: Pinguin

Jose Gutierrez Munzon    Programmer

Leonardo Olmos Barrios   Modeler, Animator

Engine: Unity with Photon for multiplayer

City, Country  La Paz Bolivia

Free wind sound by Milos Vucicevic
